Problem.Name: Base in an Intron
Problem.Description:
Start by Resetting the DNA sequence.
Then, select any DNA base that corresponds to an intron.

Requirement.FailString: That base is not in an intron.

Problem.Name: Base in 5' untranslated region
Problem.Description:
Start by Resetting the DNA sequence.
Then, select any DNA base that corresponds to the 5' untranslated region.

Requirement.FailString: That base is not in the 5' UTR.

Problem.Name: Base in 3' untranslated region
Problem.Description:
Start by Resetting the DNA sequence.
Then, select any DNA base that corresponds to the 3' untranslated region.

Requirement.FailString: That base is not in the 3' UTR.

Problem.Name: Shorter Protein
Problem.Description:
Start by Resetting the DNA sequence.
Then, change one base so that the protein is shorter.
Problem.FailString: You did not change only one base and/or the protein is not shorter.

Requirement.FailString: You did not make a single base change.
Your change does not make the protein shorter.
